description:
Ashiya`s friends Saga and Fushimi invite Ashiy and Abeno on the photography club`s overnight trip.
Since the incident with the Executive, Ashiya has been able to detect yokai at a distance.
However, he still hasn`t mastered that skill, so Abeno uses the overnight trip to develop Ashiya`s detection ability.
Yahiko is invited along to help, but a prank he pulls on Ashiya draws out another one of his latent powers--!
Source: crunchyroll
